Heading: Damaged electrical cord
Observation: A damaged electrical cable was found in the warehouse, the insulation of which had worn out in several places, with the exposed wires visible.

Heading: Unattended charging area
Observation: There were several devices in the battery charging area charging overnight without supervision or fire safety equipment.

Heading: UPS Device Warns of Fault
Observation: The UPS device in the server room gave a continuous warning sound, but the device had not been serviced.

Heading: Electrical panel markings are missing
Observation: The electrical panel lacked all markings, so it was impossible to identify the fuses and switches.

Heading: Charging batteries in an unsafe space
Observation: Lithium batteries were charged in a storage facility without fire safety equipment or supervision.

Heading: The electric motor makes abnormal noises
Observation: The electric motor of the production unit made an abnormal noise, which may indicate a fault.

Heading: Instructions for using electrical appliances are missing
Observation: The new electrical appliances lacked instructions for use and safety markings in Finnish.

Heading: Stair railing wobbles
Observation: The stair railing has detached from its fastener and wobbles when used.

Heading: Wet floor in the hallway
Observation: A large and slippery puddle of water was noticed on the floor of the corridor. It is likely that water has leaked from the outdoor shoes.

Heading: Trash bin full
Observation: The trash can in the hallway was so full that the trash spilled over the edges.

Heading: Untidy workstation on the production line
Observation: Extra items, tools and materials had accumulated at the workstation. The passage had narrowed and the risk of tripping had increased.

Heading: Cold chain broken
Observation: The material delivered to the refrigerator had been left in the warm space of the arrival pier for an unknown period of time before being stored.

Heading: Freezer door ajar
Observation: The freezer door had been left ajar, which caused energy loss and possible temperature fluctuations.

Heading: Hand towel on the floor
Observation: There was a hand towel on the floor of the hand washing station that had fallen off the hook.

Heading: First aid cabinet incomplete
Observation: I checked the contents of the first aid cabinet and noticed that it was missing several basic supplies, such as a wound dressing and tape rolls.

Heading: Slippery in the parking lot
Observation: The asphalt of the parking lot was frozen in the morning and several people almost slipped.

Heading: A pile of snow blocks visibility
Observation: The plough truck had left a large pile of snow at the intersection, which blocks the visibility to traffic.

Heading: Ice on the stairs
Observation: There was ice on the outer stairs that had not been sanded.

Heading: Outdoor lighting in the dark
Observation: The outdoor lighting in the parking area did not work, which made the area dark and dangerous.

Heading: Out of sanding sand
Observation: The area near the front doors had run out of sanding sand, even though the weather was slippery.

Heading: Forklift warning lights broken
Observation: The forklift's hazard lights did not work, which makes it difficult to notice others.

Heading: Emergency exit light in the dark
Observation: The emergency exit signal light had gone out and the route could not be seen in the dark.

Heading: Floor drain clogged
Observation: The floor drain in the production facility was clogged and water was collecting on the floor.

Heading: The smoke alarm beeps
Observation: The smoke alarm in the office kept beeping, which interfered with work.

Heading: Pallet at an angle
Observation: On the storage shelf, the pallet was crooked and threatened to tip over.

Heading: Forklift aisle markings worn out
Observation: The markings on the floor of the forklift aisle had worn almost invisible.

Heading: Ventilation does not work
Observation: The ventilation in the meeting room did not work and the air was stuffy.

Heading: Door pump broken
Observation: The door pump of the front door was broken and the door slammed slammed shut.

Heading: Office chair broken
Observation: The back of the office chair was broken and the chair tilted dangerously.

Heading: Elevator stuck
Observation: The freight elevator got stuck between two floors.

Heading: Poor lighting in the storage area
Observation: The lighting in the storage area was insufficient for safe work.

Heading: Unevenness of the floor
Observation: There was an uneven spot on the floor of the production facility that was easy to trip over.

Heading: Protective equipment is missing
Observation: The work site lacked mandatory protective equipment.

Heading: Chemical container leaks
Observation: The lid of the chemical container was loose and the contents had spilled onto the floor.

Heading: The crane does not work
Observation: The warehouse crane did not respond to use and got stuck.

Heading: Slip marks visible
Observation: There was a slip mark on the floor, where the person had clearly slipped.

Heading: Toolbox open on the floor
Observation: The toolbox had been left open in the middle of the corridor.

Heading: Dust has accumulated in the engine room
Observation: A lot of dust had accumulated in the engine room, which is a fire safety risk.

Heading: Access card left in the reader
Observation: The key card had been left in the reader and the door was open.

Heading: Fire blanket missing
Observation: The kitchen lacked a fire blanket, even though it is a must-have.

Heading: Warning plate knocked over
Observation: The warning sign for the wet floor had fallen on the floor.

Heading: A person was running up the stairs
Observation: The person ran down the stairs, carrying the items in both hands.

Heading: Protective gloves broken
Observation: The protective gloves used in the work were broken in several places.

Heading: The production line stopped abruptly
Observation: The production line stopped abruptly without warning.

Heading: Alarm button untested
Observation: The emergency alarm button had not been tested in connection with scheduled maintenance.

Heading: Gas cylinder without attachment
Observation: The gas cylinder stood freely without attachment to the wall.

Heading: Leak in the compressed air hose
Observation: There was a leak in the compressed air hose that caused a strong jet.

Heading: Floor painting worn out
Observation: The safety painting on the floor of the production facility had worn off.

Heading: The door does not have a window
Observation: The door to the production facility does not have a window, which creates a risk of collision.
